content.p: Hi, this is dubh.org. It's kind of a mish-mash of various techy bits and bobs, maintained by Brian Duff.
This site is currently under construction. In other words, most of those inviting looking links on the left don't actually go anywhere yet.
The ones that work at the moment are:
Come back soon, and hopefully more stuff will be here.
Project Marco aims to provide a hosted bookmarks service for multiple users. An initial draft of the requirements are now online
